Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli.components

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoardDelegate
    BoardDelegate is a class in which board activities are managed.
    CliPlayerHelper
    This class is made to make Cli user-friendly, answering to every possible help request from users.
    GamePhaseCommandHandler
    This class manages every possible interaction with user.
    GamePreparation
    This class manages GamePreparation phase's commands.
    GodChoice
    This class deals with CHOOSE_GODS game phase.
    InitialInfo
    This class deals with INITIAL_INFO game phase.
    MatchEnded
    This class deals with MATCH_ENDED game phase.
    MatchLost
    This class deals with MATCH_LOST game phase.
    OtherInfoHandler
    This class manages changes in a single match.
    RealGame
    This class manages REAL_GAME phase's commands.
    WaitingForAMatch
    This class manages all the messages to print when a player waits for others to arrive.
